entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard developing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 26.
